Font style.guideline: Use Lexend as the primary brand typeface.
Use Inter as the secondary brand typeface.

Logo safe zone.guideline: Maintain a minimum clear space around the logo equal to X (30px).
Logo safe zone.evidence: The minimum required clear space is defined by measurement “X”. X is 30px.

Logo safe zone.guideline: Do not place any graphic or typographic elements within the logo safe zone.
Logo safe zone.evidence: The Safe Zone should not contain any graphic or typographic elements other than the logotype itself.

Logo colours.guideline: Do not shuffle around the Icon colors.
Logo colours.evidence: Do not shuffle around the Icon colors

Logo colours.guideline: Do not use different colors for the logo.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use French Sky Blue (#85A0FE) to symbolize trust, clarity, and calm.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: French Sky Blue #85A0FE Symbolizing trust, clarity, and calm, this color embodies our commitment to transparency and openness.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use Lavender (#AA82FF) to represent creativity, innovation, and balance.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: Lavender #AA82FF A soft, calming hue that represents creativity, innovation, and a sense of balance

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use Tulip (#FE839C) to reflect passion, enthusiasm, and a forward-thinking attitude.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: tulip #FE839C Energetic and vibrant, this bold red shade reflects passion, enthusiasm, and a forward-thinking attitude.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use Bright Sun (#FFD14C) to convey positivity, optimism, and the spark of new ideas.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: Bright Sun #FFD14C This warm yellow color conveys positivity, optimism, and the spark of new ideas.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use Dark Indigo (#380F57) to signify stability, professionalism, and depth.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: Dark Indigo #380F57 A deep and thoughtful shade that signifies stability, professionalism, and depth.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use the primary brand colors to represent the essence of the brand.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: Our primary brand colors are carefully chosen to represent the essence of our brand.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Apply a palette of fun and light colors to reflect the brand’s dynamic and invite playfulness and creativity.
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: We have intentionally chosen a palette of fun and light colors to reflect our brand’s dynamic. These shades invite a sense of playfulness and creativity, making our visual identity fresh and exciting.

other.guideline: Do not use drop shadows or any other effects on the logo.
other.evidence: Do not use drop shadows or any other effects

other.guideline: Do not use any other font for the logo Typeface.
other.evidence: Do not use any other font for the Typeface

other.guideline: Do not change the size or position of the Icon and Typeface.
other.evidence: Do not change the size or position of the Icon and Typeface
